/* PayslipMapper.ListPayslip */
WITH SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE AS ( SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE, SUM(PD.SALARY_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SA_PAYSLIP_SALARY_DETAIL PD ON PD.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID WHERE PD.SALARY_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY P.PAYSLIP_ID, PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE ) SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, P.EMPLOYEE_ID, P.WORK_HISTORY_ID, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE) > 100 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE, 1, 100), '...') ELSE IFNULL(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE, '-') END AS PAYSLIP_NOTE, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) - IFNULL(SUM(B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE A00 ON A00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID AND A00.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'A00' LEFT JOIN SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE B00 ON B00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID AND B00.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'B00' WHERE P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId
AND P.EMPLOYEE_ID = ?EmployeeId
AND DATE_FORMAT(P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, '%Y') = ?PayslipPaymentYYYY
AND DATE_FORMAT(P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, '%m') = ?PayslipPaymentMM
GROUP BY P.PAYSLIP_ID ORDER BY P.EMPLOYEE_ID DESC, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD DESC

/* PayslipMapper.ListPrevNextPayslip */
SELECT P1.PAYSLIP_ID, P1.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, P1.PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM SA_PAYSLIP P INNER JOIN ( (SELECT PAYSLIP_ID, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, 'PREV' AS PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM SA_PAYSLIP WHERE PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD < ?PayslipPaymentYmd AND WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID DESC, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT PAYSLIP_ID, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, 'NEXT' AS PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM SA_PAYSLIP WHERE PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD > ?PayslipPaymentYmd AND WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD LIMIT 1) ) P1 ON P1.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID

/* PayslipMapper.GetPayslip */
SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, P.EMPLOYEE_ID, P.WORK_HISTORY_ID, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, IFNULL(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE, '-') AS PAYSLIP_NOTE, P.RANK_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS RANK_CODE_NAME, H.JOIN_YMD FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN HM_WORK_HISTORY H ON H.WORK_HISTORY_ID = P.WORK_HISTORY_ID LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = P.RANK_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'RANK_00' WHERE P.PAYSLIP_ID = ?PayslipId

/* PayslipMapper.AddPayslip */
INSERT INTO SA_PAYSLIP ( EMPLOYEE_ID, WORK_HISTORY_ID, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, PAYSLIP_NOTE, RANK_CODE, CREATER_ID ) VALUES ( ?EmployeeId, ?WorkHistoryId, REPLACE(?PayslipPaymentYmd, '-', ''), CASE ?PayslipNote WHEN '' THEN NULL ELSE ?PayslipNote END, ?RankCode, ?CreaterId ) ;SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
